import React from 'react'; import './BannerPitch.scss'; export default function BannerPitch() { return (
We Care About
Your Families
Check how your families health is by professional team doctor with
complete and modern facilities services
Our Advantages
  • Make an appointment
  • Digital x-ray on site
  • Emergency Services
  • Immunizations
) }
